name: Ledgity
description: Ledgity democratizes the wealth management industry by making non-traditional assets available to everyone! Beyond the digitization of investors’ experience, we make it easy for financial advisors and their clients to widen their investment scope. For the first time, Crypto Assets, Defi Yield Strategies and Tokenized Assets will be accessible to anyone. Ledgity has built the first digital private bank infrastructure that harnesses blockchain technology to enable the exchange of any assets. Crypto Assets, Defi Yield Strategies, and Tokenized Assets will be offered to all, and made available at investor fingertips on our fully integrated platform. The LTY token is designed as a native token of the Ledgity Ecosystem. The token integrates a number of utility functions such as discount fees, priority access, the project’s intellectual property and much more.
